## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (see CLAUDE.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this in a real Pi-hole environment (or explain why not)
- [ ] All commits follow the conventional commit format (feat:, fix:, docs:, etc.)
